member.name: P:ActiveRecord.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ActiveRecord.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:ActiveRecord.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:ActiveRecord.CodeFirst.Record`1.GetList(System.Data.Entity.DbContext)
member.summary: Get Queryable entry for current type

member.name: M:ActiveRecord.CodeFirst.Record`1.Load(System.Data.Entity.DbContext,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets requested item, uses find on DbSet
member.param: If item is not found return null or nothing
member.returns: Returns item found, by default if item is not found returns empty item

member.name: M:ActiveRecord.CodeFirst.Record`1.DeletePartial(System.Data.Entity.DbContext)
member.summary: Marks that this item should be deleted, but does not trigger save changes in the context
member.remarks: This should be used when you want to delete an item but not trigger an additional save changes, the protected handle functions should only use this for other objects

member.name: M:ActiveRecord.CodeFirst.Record`1.SavePartial(System.Data.Entity.DbContext)
member.summary: Marks that this item should be inserted/updated, but does not trigger SaveChanges on context
member.remarks: This should be used when you want to insert an item or trigger an item should be saved, the protected handle function should only use this

member.name: M:ActiveRecord.CodeFirst.Record`1.Save(System.Data.Entity.DbContext)
member.summary: Marks item should be saved, and triggers SaveCanges to submit all changes on the current context
member.remarks: This should not be used from inside the protected handle functions

member.name: M:ActiveRecord.CodeFirst.Record`1.Delete(System.Data.Entity.DbContext,System.Int32)
member.summary: Marks an item by it's id should be deleted then triggers all changes on the context should be done to the database
member.remarks: This should not be used from inside the protected handle functions. also this triggers a load from the db first

member.name: M:ActiveRecord.CodeFirst.Record`1.Delete(System.Data.Entity.DbContext)
member.summary: Marks an item should be deleted then triggers all changes on the context should be done to the database
member.remarks: This should not be used from inside the protected handle functions

member.name: T:ActiveRecord.CodeFirst.Record`1
member.summary: This is inherited by a poco object wanting to support the ActiveRecord Pattern
member.typeparam: The poco type, required so that the ActiveRecord function returns the correct type
